clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of infections due to staphylococci and other susceptible organisms

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Novobiocin is an aminocoumarin antibiotic that was produced by the actinomycete i Streptomyces niveus i Novobiocin binds to DNA gyrase and blocks adenosine triphosphatase ATPase activity Other antibiotics in the aminocoumarin class include coumermycin A1 and clorobiocin
